character.age: 220 years, appears to be 25 due to species' regenerative properties
character.background: Formerly a member of an elite assassination squad, Arin is on the run from their former organization after discovering a dark secret. They seek redemption and answers.
character.place-of-birth: The Forgotten Isles, a mystical archipelago in the northern hemisphere

physical-appearance.eye-color: Piercing emerald green with vertical pupils for low-light vision
physical-appearance.hair-color: Silver-white, often styled in a messy, spiky manner
